name: Everybody's RPG
description:
* This game needs an internet connection to use the network to save and read the game data.

Everybody's RPG open!
If you install now, a lot of jewels and gold is given!!

High-quality dot graphic that brings back old memories!
Heroes with various jobs are prepared.

# Combining various jobs, which is the characteristic fun of an RPG game!

# Enjoy the fun of becoming stronger after reincarnating every time!

# The fun of farming powerful items and reinforcing!

# Various character graphics full of personality!

# Invade the dungeon and create powerful relics!

# Have PvP battles with people all around the world!
